Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Nope not ponzi scheme. It’s a retirement scheme haha.ponzi schemes require you to keep contributing and recruiting downlines to get more sales people with no real product.our cpf funds are invested through temasek and GIC. And here’s the thing. The money you see on your cpf login is REAL.my dad passed away earlier this year. My mum recieved a 6 digit cheque from cpf basically his CPF savings. And she now doesnt know where to put this money which has similar safe and high returns at around 2.5 to 5 percent.food for thought! But good question.1 comment3
